name: Disgruntled
description:
"Disgruntled" is a 2D casual game where you work in a sandwich shop and your goal is to earn as many points as you can by getting your customers' orders wrong. 

This was made during a 48-hour game jam where the theme was "Disappointed" using the Godot game engine. All of the artwork was made for the game.

Credits

  • Art and development by Anthony Alcala
  • Music: "School" by Komiku
  • Applause Sound by Mike Koenig - http://soundbible.com/988-Applause.html
  • Cha Ching Register Sound by Muska666 - http://soundbible.com/1997-Cha-Ching-Register.html
  • Male Grunt Sound - http://soundbible.com/462-Male-Grunt.html
